english_example_sentence: The important document was delivered by sending it via fast courier.
russian_example_sentence: Важный документ был доставлен, отправив его через быстрого курьера.
turkish_example_sentence: Önemli belge hızlı kurye göndererek teslim edildi.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Önemli belge hızlı kurye ______ teslim edildi.
